dict.string: on alfred_script(q) try set ctrl to word 1 of (q as string) on error set ctrl to (q as string) end try try set option to text ((length of ctrl) + 2) thru end of (q as string) on error set option to "" end try tell application "Hermes" if ctrl = "like" or ctrl = "good" or ctrl is equal to "+" then thumbs up else if ctrl = "dislike" or ctrl = "bad" or ctrl = "-" then thumbs down else if ctrl = "skip" or ctrl = "next" or ctrl = "~" then next song else if ctrl = "tired" or ctrl = "!" then tired of song else if ctrl = "play" or ctrl = ">" then play else if ctrl = "pause" or ctrl = "#" then pause else if ctrl = "playpause" or ctrl = "pp" then playpause else if ctrl = "mute" or ctrl = "silence" or ctrl = "m" then mute else if ctrl = "unmute" or ctrl = "u" then unmute else if ctrl = "loud" or ctrl = "f" then full volume else if ctrl = "louder" or ctrl = "l" then raise volume else if ctrl = "softer" or ctrl = "quieter" or ctrl = "q" then lower volume else if ctrl = "volume" or ctrl = "v" then set current volume to v else if ctrl = "show" or ctrl = "activate" or ctrl = "a" then activate else if ctrl = "station" or ctrl = "switch" or ctrl = "s" then set current station to station option end if end tell end alfred_script
